thread.section_title: Holiday Inn Express London - Hammersmith - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Convenient hotel with nice service and free breakfast
thread.title_full: Convenient hotel with nice service and free breakfast - Review of Holiday Inn Express London - Hammersmith, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Jeffdee
title: Convenient hotel with nice service and free breakfast
text: We stay here often when we go to London. It is very convenient when you drive from the west along the M4. It has secure parking which is reasonably priced if you are staying at the hotel. It is located in the centre of Hammersmith with easy access to a variety of bars and places to eat. It is also easy to get a tube into central London. The rooms are clean and fresh and a reasonable size. The staff are always very friendly and helpful. The is a buffet breakfast included in the price. This has a fairly decent choice of both hot and cold items and you can fill up before a long day sightseeing.
